items.name: Rolex Sea Dweller
items.description: Oyster, Oystersteel and yellow gold. The king of divers.

items.name: Tudor Pelagos
items.description: Manufacture Calibre MT5400 (COSC). Unidirectional rotating bezel. Titanium bracelet

items.name: Omega Seamaster diver 300m
items.description: James Bond 60th anniversary. 300m water resistant. A classic in the worlds of watches. Stainless steel. Sapphire glass.

items.name: The Longines Legend Diver
items.description: A rich history. Elegant yet reliable. 300m water resistant. Stainless steel. Sapphire glass.

items.name: Seiko Prospex
items.description: Lumibrite applied. The quality and expertise of Japanese watchmaker Seiko. 300m water resistant. Stainless steel. Sapphire glass.

items.name: The Longines Master Collection
items.description: Automatic. Sapphire glass.

items.name: Tank Must Watch
items.description: Stainless steel. Synthetic sapphire

items.name: Grand Seiko Elegance
items.description: Sapphire glass. Stainless steel. 30 rubies. Anti-reflection coating.

items.name: Timex Marlin
items.description: Acrylic glass. Stainless steel. The reissue of a 1960s timepiece. A true gentleman's watch.

items.name: Junghans white Max Bill
items.description: Sapphire glass. Stainless steel. German's finest. Automatic.

items.name: Hamilton Khaki Field
items.description: One of the most emblematic models of the firm. Maybe of fields watches. Nato bracelet or nylon. Stainless steel.

items.name: CWC T20 GS Watch
items.description: Light and reliable quartz movement. New Tonneau design. Nato strap.

items.name: Seiko Prospex Alpinist
items.description: One of the emblematic watches from Seiko. Adventurous, yet splendid. Sapphire glass. Stainless steel.

items.name: Tudor Ranger
items.description: For the 70th anniversary of The British North Greenland Expedition. A watch that braves all dangers. Caliber MT5402.

items.name: Marathon General Purpose
items.description: Designed for military purposes. Tritium luminescence. Sapphire glass.

items.name: IWC Big Pilot's
items.description: The art of watchmaking displayed in one piece. Seven days power reserve.  Sapphire glass.

items.name: Khaki Aviation Pilot Pioneer
items.description: Inspired by WWII's Model 23. Rotating bezel. Sporty but still classy. Bronze and titanium case. Sapphire glass.

items.name: Alpina Startimer Pilot
items.description: Made by a Swiss house that has a rich history spanning more than 135 years. Stainless steel. Sapphire glass.

items.name: Farer Bradfield
items.description: A classic-inspired pilot's watch. Designed for pure legibility. A watch that will light up the sky at night. Super-LumiNova.

items.name: Tag Heuer Autavia Cosc GMT
items.description: An authentic pilot's watch with a heritage and history. Super-LumiNova. Ceramic rotating bezel.

items.name: Nomos Autobahn Neomatik
items.description: A watch that shows a great confidence. A special design for a reputable German watchmaker. Sapphire glass. Stainless steel. Super-LumiNova.

items.name: Tag Heuer Monaco
items.description: The iconic racer model. Sapphire glass. 100m water resistant.

items.name: Farer Meredith
items.description: Designed in London, made in Switzerland. A splendid copper dial that will match all occasions. A sapphire domed crystal.

items.name: Yema Meangraf Super B70
items.description: A pure race design. Using the Seiko VK64 mechanical-quartz hybrid movement. Bi-directional bezel. Stainless steel.

items.name: Seiko Prospex Speedtimer
items.description: Solar powered. 6 months power reserve (on full charge). LumiBrite on hands & indexes. Curved sapphire crystal. Stainless steel.
